name.ja: ヴァルモニカ・ヴェルサーレ

text.en:
Apply 1 of these effects (your opponent's choice, if you do not have a "Valmonica" card in your Pendulum Zone).
● Gain 500 LP, then you can excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a "Valmonica" card, and if you do, add it to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● Take 500 damage, then you can send 1 "Valmonica" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Valmonica Versare".
You can only activate 1 "Valmonica Versare" per turn.
